message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $10,000, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $11,500. Can you consider that?
